text:
To be honest, the differential pricing by @SerumInstIndia for #COVID19 #vaccine is truly baffling.

With so many people under 45 age dying in this 2nd wave of #Covid, we should find a way to provide #VaccineForAll, not just to those who can afford!

#OneNationOnePrice #CovidIndia https://t.co/72N9Z65QG4
